mapper.insert: INSERT INTO card (user_id, card_no, owner, month, year, birth_date, is_default, type) VALUE (#{userId}, #{cardNo}, aes_encrypt(#{owner}, concat('ytCvvWEKB3DsHmeg7Almr26MWeoyCjLkfd', #{userId})), #{month}, #{year}, aes_encrypt(#{birthDate}, concat('ytCvvWEKB3DsHmeg7Almr26MWeoyCjLkfd', #{userId})) #{isDefault}, #{type} )
mapper.select: SELECT id , user_id , card_no , aes_decrypt(owner, concat('ytCvvWEKB3DsHmeg7Almr26MWeoyCjLkfd', #{param1})) as owner , month , year , aes_decrypt(birth_date, concat('ytCvvWEKB3DsHmeg7Almr26MWeoyCjLkfd', #{param1})) as birth_date , is_default , type FROM card WHERE user_id = #{param1}
